item.title: Ariel add a quote by Tom Kelley
item.description: "That combination of thought and action defines creative confidence: the ability to come up with new ideas and the courage to try them out." -- Tom Kelley

item.title: Ariel add a quote by Tom Kelley
item.description: "It turns out that creativity isn’t some rare gift to be enjoyed by the lucky few—it’s a natural part of human thinking and behavior. In too many of us it gets blocked. But it can be unblocked. And unblocking that creative spark can have far-reaching implications for yourself, your organization, and your community." -- Tom Kelley

item.title: Ariel add a quote by Tom Kelley
item.description: "The history of discovery is full of creative serendipity." -- Tom Kelley

item.title: Ariel add a quote by Matt Tenney
item.description: "If we're not comparing the present moment to thoughts of the past or thoughts of the future, the present moment is actually perfect just as it is." -- Matt Tenney
